name: 不当英雄ROGUELIKE HERO
description:
ROGUELIKE HERO is a roguelike RPG action game full of hilarious close-up fighting combats.

You play as Gou Xiong a.k.a. “Black Bear”, a Kung Fu master without any principle. He spits, he farts, and he attacks the groin. As the protagonist of the game, Gou Xiong enjoys his countless, although shameless triumphs over his most dedicated enemies. However, one day, a powerful evil spirit breaks into his world. What story would these two bring to us?

KEY FEATURES
- Hundreds of skill-building items that will push your shameless fighting style to the limit.
- Roguelike levels with random enemies and obstacles ensuring replayability.
- 24 most unexpected, and funny weapons to wield upon your enemies.
- 4 sets of charming Asian style landscapes to explore.
- An immensely cute cat. Well, who doesn’t like cats. Ok, if you don't, then an immensely powerful fighting companion.
